sentences.en: Ground of schoolchild armour terrified answers: Not be my warpwarp!
sentences.cn: 学童甲惶恐地答道: “不是我弄歪的! ”

sentences.en: It is now known to every schoolchild that the earth is round.
sentences.cn: 现在每个小学生都知道地球是圆的.

sentences.en: Last year I had an audience of schoolchildren and they laughed at everything.
sentences.cn: 去年我有一群小学生听众，他们听到什么都哈哈大笑。

sentences.en: Many parents are worried about drug addiction among the schoolchild.
sentences.cn: 许多家长因在孩子中存在的毒品成瘾问题而担忧.

sentences.en: The desire to mark one's desk is not limited to the snotty - nosed schoolchild with a penknife.
sentences.cn: 并不是只有淌着鼻涕的学童想用铅笔刀在桌子上刻下记号.
